article.title: L-3 to Remanufacture F-16 Traveling Wave Tubes
article.text: L-3 Communications, San Carlos, California, has been awarded a $6,816,326 firm-fixed-price, indefinite-delivery contract for the remanufacture of F-16 Traveling Wave Tubes. Work will be performed at San Carlos, California, and is expected to be completed by Dec. 29, 2016. The Air Force Sustainment Center, Hill Air Force Base, Utah, is the contracting activity (FA8251-14-D-0007).
